original: Claus, Nils Georg Harald, tandläkare, Lidköping, f. 17/11/06 i Halmstad av Joel C. o. Olivia Extergren. G. 37 m. Gunvor Grath. Barn: Ann-Charlotte f. 41, Amelie 44. — Stud:ex. i Lillehammer, Norge, 27, tandl :kand. 30, tandläk. 32. Tf. assist, v. tandl inst. 32, vik. i Västervik 33, praktik i Lidköp. sed. s. å.
translated: Claus, Nils Georg Harald, dentist, Lidköping, b. 17/11/06 in Halmstad to Joel C. and Olivia Extergren. Married in 1937 to Gunvor Grath. Children: Ann-Charlotte b. 1941, Amelie b. 1944. He finished secondary school in Lillehammer, Norway in 1927, graduated from dental school in 1930, and became a licensed dentist in 1932. Became a temporary assistant at the dental institute in 1932, worked as a substitute in Västervik in 1933, and started his own practice in Lidköping the same year.
